transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir very good morning.
Executive: Good morning.
Customer: Haan ji, se hi baat kar rahi thi actually wo aapka message aa raha tha mere ko whatsapp pe na ki abhi tak koi update nahi aaya karke.
Executive: Right.
Customer: To maine na already sir aapko bataya tha message bhi drop kiya tha maine whatsapp pe ki maine already mail kiya hua hai team ko waha se mujhe koi abhi revert aaya nahi hai theek hai waha se jaise hi koi revert aata hai to main aapko us cheez se related main aapko update kar dungi theek hai aaj dobara un logo ne humse screenshot wagera liya hai jo aapne mobile app ka hame bheja tha na jaha pe aapka nature of business waha pe retailer show kar raha tha.
Hmm.
Executive: Right to wo screenshot unhone aaj humse dobara liya hai humne dobara attach kiya hai ab wo jaise hi us pe kuch confirmation dete hain main aapko us cheez se related update kar dungi theek hai aaj aaj attach kiya aapne?
Customer: Nahi nahi maine mail to sir saturday hi friday hi kar diya tha aaj aaj bhi kiya hai aapne aaj bhi kiya tha.
Executive: Haan aaj bhi maine reply kiya hai aaj mere pass reply aaya hai waha se ki wo screenshot chahiye dobara karke to wo maine wapas se waha pe attach kiya hua hai theek hai to jaise hi waha pe update aata hai main aapko us cheez se related update kar dungi even main aapko ek bari ye screenshot bhi de deti hu dekh lijiyega.
Executive: Dekhiye whatsapp pe bheja aapko.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to ye mail hamara already mail pe hamara ye chal raha hai jaise hi iska kuch solution aata hai main aapko us cheez se related update kar dungi aap dekh sakte hain timing bhi humne aaj hi morning mein 9:25 pe hi humne reply kiya hai theek hai to iska jaise hi hame update aata hai main aapko update kar dungi theek hai don't worry aapko pareshan hone ki zarurat nahi hai.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay ji iske alawa to koi dikkat nahi hai na aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi filhal nahi.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai okay koi rahega to aap mujhe directly call kar lena mere number pe.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay ji okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received an update.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about the mail sent to team.

- Executive will update once revert is received.

- Screenshot was resent to the team.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will provide an update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- update, screenshot, retailer, mail
